SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.authorization

Interface IAuthorizationPlugin

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLdapPlugin, FalsePlugin, LdapAttrPlugin, LdapFilterPlugin, LdapUserPlugin, TruePlugin, UserPlugin, UserWhiteListPlugin
public interface IAuthorizationPlugin
Interface for authorization plug-ins. All plug-ins considered for authorization must implement this interface
Author:
Krystof Tulinger

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isAllowed(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Group group)
    This method should decide if given request should be allowed to view or display the group.
    boolean

  • Method Details

    • load

      void load(Map<String,Object> parameters)
      Called when the plug-in is loaded into memory. With the parameters from the configuration. This can be used for establishing database/LDAP connection or perform initialization.
      Parameters:
      parameters - parameters specified in the configuration

    • unload

      void unload()
      Called when the plug-in is about to be deleted from the memory. This can be used for releasing connections and/or other release stuff.

    • isAllowed

      boolean isAllowed(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Project project)
      This method should decide if given request should be allowed to view or display the project. It is up to the implementor if the standard request attributes like session, user principal and others are used or not.
      Parameters:
      request - servlet request
      project - project to test
      Returns:
      true if request is allowed to see this project

    • isAllowed

      boolean isAllowed(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Group group)
      This method should decide if given request should be allowed to view or display the group. It is up to the implementor if the standard request attributes like session, user principal and others are used or not. VERY IMPORTANT NOTE: Allowing particular group does not allow its projects, repositories. You must include those in the isAllowed method for project if you want to display content of the group.
      Parameters:
      request - servlet request
      group - group to test
      Returns:
      true if request is allowed to see this group of projects
